name: Beyond a Total Loss Demo
description:
Beyond a Total Loss is a darkly humorous 2D action-adventure game with a dash of survival horror. 

In this demo (that also serves as a prologue to the main game) you play as Randy, a bad-tempered car mechanic and part time bootlegger.

Story

Randy has a bad dream, there is someone in his bedroom and on top of that they want him to make more moonshine. What a day!

Features
  • BLOOD: Know your health by the amount of blood on your face!
  • ALCOHOL: Drink all the moonshine you can find!
  • VIOLENCE: Shoot bullets from guns into horribly deformed creatures!
  • VERBAL ABUSE: Try to be nice and fail miserably!
  • PUZZLES: Is it a cat or an onion?
  • TALKING: Have a conversation or just point at people with your gun!
  • CHOICES: Conversation choices that sometimes have consequences and sometimes don’t!
  • INVENTORY TETRIS: Unleash your inner OCD by managing your inventory!
  • MINIMAL HUD: Use your brain to remember how many bullets you have left!
Full Game Release

The full game will be released at the end of june 2019 on steam
